name: Front Mission 5: Scars of the War
synopsis: This game marks the celebration of the 10th Anniversary of Square's Front Mission strategy series. You play as Walter, who's joined on with the U.S.N. Forces. In addition to a stronger adventure portion, in which you go about scouting your own battalion members, the game includes a number of bonus modes, including Survival Simulator, Battle Simulator and Arena, where you can collect money and parts.
